channel.title: C++ on Travis Green
channel.description: Recent content in C++ on Travis Green

item.title: C++: Customer Database Implemented Using Files
item.description: Uses recursion, pointers, operator overloading, debug mode, copy constructors, and makefiles. Linked-list implementation of a customer information database. User can add, print, modify, and delete records within the database. The user can also reverse the list of records. The records within the list are written to a file upon exiting the application, and read from a file upon starting an application.

item.title: C++: SOLID OOP Video Series
item.description: Providing simple, yet comprehensive examples of Bob Martin’s SOLID principles, using C++. Video series linked below!
